definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小肠平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: Angiomyolipoma was also found in the contralateral kidney.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌脂肪瘤也发现对侧肾。

sentences.english: It acts directly on vascular smooth muscle as a potent vasoconstrictor.
sentences.chinese: 它可直接对血管平滑肌作为一种强有力的血管收缩剂。

sentences.english: Objective:To discover the clinical and pathological expression of skin leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨皮肤平滑肌瘤的临床病理表现。

sentences.english: Primary leiomyosarcoma of the lung is a rare malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 肺原发性平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Vascular smooth muscle cell proliferative ability is significantly associated with its phenotype transforming.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌细胞增殖能力与其表型转化密切相关。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical pathologic characteristics of hepatic angiomyolipoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肝血管平滑肌脂肪瘤的临床病理特点。

sentences.english: The muscular venules consisted of a few layers of smooth muscle cells in circle arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 肌性微静脉的中膜由几层环形排列的平滑肌细胞构成。

sentences.english: Methods The CT appearances on 23 cases of RAL were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 回顾分析23例肾血管平滑肌脂肪瘤的CT表现。

sentences.english: Herein, we report a case of leiomyoma of the bladder.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告一膀胱平滑肌瘤病例。

sentences.english: Conclusion Superselective uterine arterial embolization is an effective and micro invasive method in treating uterine fibroids .
sentences.chinese: 结论子宫动脉栓塞是治疗子宫平滑肌瘤的良好方法。

sentences.english: However, if it is just the fimbria end. smooth muscle bundle is not necessary to make diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 然而如果仅是输卵管的伞端，就并不一定有平滑肌束。

sentences.english: Methods Isotonic contraction of vessel smooth muscle was recorded.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用血管平滑肌等张收缩的方法。

sentences.english: AIM To study the potassium currents in rat intrapulmonary artery smooth muscle cells(SMCs).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠肺内动脉平滑肌细胞钾电流。

sentences.english: Methods CT findings of 15 patients with RAML were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析15例肾血管平滑肌脂肪瘤的CT表现。

sentences.english: METHODS VSMCs proliferation model of cultured rat thoracic aorta was established.
sentences.chinese: 方法建立大鼠主动脉血管平滑肌增殖模型。

definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
